message: I think this split is more fair.  Let's get this done!
Come on, meet me in the middle
This is my final offer. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Let's be reasonable.  We can both get a fair share.  Accept this offer and we both win.
Your 'fair share' is getting less valuable by the round
I've been trying to be fair, but we're running out of time.  This is my best offer.  Accept it and we can both get something.
Time is on my side, your money is losing value fast
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm willing to concede a bit more, but this is my final offer. Let's end this now.
